column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Environment was like a very new
column4: patio and seating but the main difference is the tasty food and excellent service. Everyone was so positive and attentive that it's hard to even suggest improvements. The only thing that comes to mind is enforcing a dress code - was a little surprised to see people in short shorts and flip flops in the dining area. Also
column6: $14 is a little high for drinks
column7: but seems like the Newport Beach prices moved to Houston with the restaurant.
